creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
presumably, some code changes / build system changes need to be performed to
make sure this works reliably. of course, this assumes that upstream (cocoon
etc) works with JDK 1.5 too.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
jdk 1.5 has problems with xalan:

I think that this is the issue: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XALANJ-1978

Gregor J. Rothfuss wrote:

> Peter Johnson wrote:
>
>> 115139 2005-02-03 09:43:03,422 [http-8080-Processor4] DEBUG
org.apache.lenya.ac.file.FileItemManager.notifyRemoved():380  - 
>
>
>
> it dies in notifyRemoved(). would you mind adding more logging to that class
to track this down?
>
>

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
Lenya 1.2 and 1.4 can now be made to run with JDK 1.5 see the two depending bugs
for details.
Both bugs has been resolved and Lenya now supports 1.5.
creator: thorsten@apache.org
